TopicTitle: Is there alternitive to watching KSP Twitch Streams?

Articles.Content: I would love to watch the one Maxmaps did, however I find Twitch unstable at best when it comes to loading previous videos for some reason. These should be loaded to Youtube or a different alternative video site.
Maybe try a video downloader. Then watch the video from your computer instead of the internet.

I often miss the live Squadcast and have to watch it later. I've only run into problems trying to watch the archived copy once.

However, I do think that uploading a copy of the Squadcast to youtube would be a good idea. Expanding the number of possible eyes on it and all...
I don't like videos, I just wait until other people see it and then I read their summaries
The best part is you can upload to youtube direct from Twitch - though you have to make a "hilight" first and then send that.
